title: Pink Floyd-Watching The World Upon The Wall(2008)[AUD +][EAC-FLA

Watching The World Upon The Wall represents the silver debut of Pink FloydÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s June 16th, 1981 performance of The Wall at EarlÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Court in London, which was both the next to last of the tour as well as Roger WatersÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢ penultimate with the band (until the Live 8 reunion some 24 years later).

Previously, this show was only available via a handful of fan-produced CDR titles such as Whistlers In The Audience, Warm Thrill Of Confusion, and most recently, the Pro-CDR bonus disc Deepest Fear, all of which utilized one of two audience recordings known to exist.

Cutting to the chase here, Godfather have simply outdone themselves with this release, which is in a word, phenomenal. Of course, the audio content is obviously far more important than the packaging, but again, Godfather have surpassed all of their previous Floyd releases in that regard.
